ink.base.connectors.StardogConnector¶

class ink.base.connectors.StardogConnector(conn_details, database)¶

Bases: ink.base.connectors.AbstractConnector

A Stardog connector

This Stardog connector class sets up the connection to a Stardog database.

Parameters

  • conn_details (dict) – a dictionary containing all the connection details.

  • database (str) – database of interest.

Example

>>> details = {'endpoint': 'http://localhost:5820'}
>>> connector = StardogConnector(details, "example_database")
__init__(conn_details, database)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Function to delete the delete the database when it is available :return: None

Uploads the knowledge graph to the previously initialized database.
delete_db()¶

Function to delete the delete the database when it is available :return: None

query(q_str)¶

Execute a query on the initialized Stardog database :param q_str: Query string. :type q_str: str :return: Dictionary generated from the [‘results’][‘bindings’] json. :rtype: dict

upload_kg(filename)¶

Uploads the knowledge graph to the previously initialized database. :param filename: The filename of the knowledge graph. :type filename: str :return: None
